--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras landed in his old base's limit and waited
> Myrmidon

Myrmidon followed Hydras, shifting form and landing
lightly nearby. His movements are agile and swift, yet
there is a sense of controlled power in all his
movements. His gait is almost a smooth stalk, 
unconsciously silent as he moves with Hydras. 

He turned to regard his new leader, "Where are the
rest of the Predacons?" Myrmidon's deep voice despite
its obvious power carries just enough to reach Hydras.
Myrmidon turns to look once again at thier
surroundings as he continues speaking, " ... and what
is the situtation between us and the Maximals?"

Preston
(Myrmidon)
